summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 39, Supplemental Plat of Pontius 2d Addition, being the alley between Bellevue Avenue North and Summit Avenue North, from East Thomas Street to East Harrison Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10387 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
